channel.title: Create Cluster on Weaveworks Introduction to GitOps w/ AWS EKS
channel.description: Recent content in Create Cluster on Weaveworks Introduction to GitOps w/ AWS EKS

item.title: Create EKS Cluster
item.description: If an eks cluster has already been created for you: export AWS_REGION=$(curl -s 169.254.169.254/latest/dynamic/instance-identity/document | jq -r '.region') export AWS_DEFAULT_REGION=$AWS_REGION export EKS_CLUSTER_NAME=$(eksctl get cluster -o json | jq -r '.[0]["name"]') eksctl utils write-kubeconfig --name $EKS_CLUSTER_NAME Before creating the EKS cluster, please make sure that you have the right role. aws sts get-caller-identity --query Arn | grep TeamRole -q && echo "IAM role valid" || echo "IAM role NOT valid" If the IAM role is not valid, DO NOT PROCEED.
